name: HSC_TESTS
description: This table stores information about the tests that are run for Specimens.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Specimen Collection (HSC) record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TESTS_ID
columns.description: This column contains the procedure that needs to be performed in the lab.
